mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate from reply
select count(*) from reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
